instructions: In a pot, heat a small amount of oil with paprika. Add sliced onions and sauté until translucent.
Next, add all the vegetables along with salt and sauté for about half an hour.
Pour in boiling water and add the chicken. Finally, add the potatoes.
notes: This hearty vegetable soup is traditionally served with couscous in Tunisian-Djerban Jewish cuisine, making it a perfect accompaniment for a comforting meal.
